property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Pakistani and U.S. service members saying goodbye

note.text: At the end of a meeting, if your counterparts give you a small gift, it is appropriate to offer a small gift in return, like a military challenge coin.
Donâ€™t rush to close a meeting or deal. Saying goodbye may take a long time, but following local social customs is very important for maintaining relationships.
